      • searchSchools

        public java.util.ArrayList<University> searchSchools(java.lang.String name,
                                                     java.lang.String state,
                                                     java.lang.String location,
                                                     java.lang.String control,
                                                     int numberOfStudents,
                                                     int numberOfStudents2,
                                                     double percentFemale,
                                                     double percentFemale2,
                                                     double SATVerbal,
                                                     double SATVerbal2,
                                                     double SATMath,
                                                     double SATMath2,
                                                     double expenses,
                                                     double expenses2,
                                                     double percentFinancialAid,
                                                     double percentFinancialAid2,
                                                     int numberOfApplicants,
                                                     int numberOfApplicants2,
                                                     double percentAdmitted,
                                                     double percentAdmitted2,
                                                     double percentEnrolled,
                                                     double percentEnrolled2,
                                                     int academicScale,
                                                     int academicScale2,
                                                     int socialScale,
                                                     int socialScale2,
                                                     int qualityOfLifeScale,
                                                     int qualityOfLifeScale2,
                                                     java.lang.String emphasis)
        account This is a method to search for schools
        Parameters:
        name - of school
        state - schools is located
        locaiton - of school (urban, rural...)
        control - of the university (public or private)
        numberOfStudents - currently attending the school
        percentFemale - percentage of females attending the school
        SATVerbal - the average SAT verbal score for enrolled students
        SATMath - the average SAT math score for enrolled students
        expenses - annual expenses or tuition to attend the schools
        percentFinancialAid - % of enrolled students receiving financial aid
        numberOfApplicants - # of people who apply each year
        percentAdmitted - % of applicants admitted
        percentEnrolled - percent of applicants that decide to enroll
        academicScale - scale 1-5 of academic scale of school
        socialScale - scale 1-5 indicating the social life at school
        qualityOfLifeScale - scale 1-5 indicating the quality of life at school
        emphases - up to five areas of study (all strings) in which the school excels
